summary.intent: Standardize button/link terminology on the ContextTab page by replacing all 'Browse' labels with 'Display all' for consistency.
summary.outcome: Successfully changed 6 'Browse' labels to 'Display all' in ContextTab.tsx; all 1274 tests passed and lint was clean.

repo: In ContextTab.tsx, FileRow components used 'Browse' while ItemRow components used 'Display all' â€” two different label conventions existed for similar actions before this change.

code.finding: Contains both FileRow and ItemRow components; FileRow previously used 'Browse' for opening browser modals on individual items, ItemRow used 'Display all' for showing all items in a category. Now unified to 'Display all'.

workflow: Test suite has 1274 tests; lint and tests are run as a standard post-edit verification step.
Grep with alternation (Display all|Browse) was effective for quickly locating all label usage sites before editing.
